title: Weekend Review, Sand and Soul, Kanye West, Doug E. Fresh and more.
itunes:title: Weekend Review, Sand and Soul, Kanye West, Doug E. Fresh and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  The crew is still in Mexico making it do what it does.  Sand and Soul was a huge success.  So many blessings to be thankful and grateful for.  There were so many special guests from all over the country.  The First Lady of The Steve Harvey Nation was shining on her birthday.  Junior (The Magnet) was the recipient of unrelenting female attention.  Kanye took his Sunday Service to Howard University.  Does your significant other only have drunken sex with you?  Today we honor bald men for National Bald Day.  Doug E. Fresh was highly praised for his skillset by The Steve Harvey Morning Show.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog shows us the importance of acceptance and tolerance, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
